description: A gang of 4 Danish criminals are ordered by Færingen to steal a bag from a safe. When they see DKK4,000,000 in the bag, they keep it for themselves and head for Spain. They end up in a ruin of an old restaurant on Funen and renovate it.
stars: Søren Pilmark, Ulrich Thomsen, Mads Mikkelsen, Nikolaj Lie Kaas

description: At a Montréal public grade school, an Algerian immigrant is hired to replace a popular teacher who committed suicide in her classroom. While helping his students deal with their grief, his own recent loss is revealed.
stars: Mohamed Fellag, Sophie Nélisse, Émilien Néron, Danielle Proulx

description: The story of an unlikely friendship between a bear, Ernest, and a young mouse named Celestine.
stars: Lambert Wilson, Pauline Brunner, Anne-Marie Loop, Patrice Melennec

description: An enterprising Saudi girl signs on for her school's Koran recitation competition as a way to raise the remaining funds she needs in order to buy the green bicycle that has captured her interest.
stars: Waad Mohammed, Reem Abdullah, Abdullrahman Al Gohani, Ahd

movie: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
description: In this action-packed comedy, Nicolas Cage plays Nick Cage, channeling his iconic characters as he's caught between a superfan (Pedro Pascal) and a CIA agent (Tiffany Haddish).
stars: Nicolas Cage, Pedro Pascal, Tiffany Haddish, Sharon Horgan

description: Where are we humans going? A film poem inspired by the Peruvian poet César Vallejo. We meet people in the city. People trying to communicate, searching compassion and get the connection of small and large things.
stars: Lars Nordh, Stefan Larsson, Bengt C.W. Carlsson, Torbjörn Fahlström

description: Thirty years ago Bolshoi Orchestra conductor Andreï Filipov was fired for hiring Jewish musicians. Now a lowly janitor, an opportunity arises to gather his old musicians to go and pose as the official Buolshoi orchestra in Paris.
stars: Aleksey Guskov, Mélanie Laurent, Dmitriy Nazarov, François Berléand

description: A dissatisfied 40-year-old, separated and without time for his own daughter and girlfriend must rethink his life when his father decides to marry his mother, who suffers from Alzheimer's disease, by church.
stars: Ricardo Darín, Héctor Alterio, Norma Aleandro, Eduardo Blanco

description: When the kinetic Rory moves into his room in the Carrigmore Residential Home for the Disabled, his effect on the home is immediate. Most telling is his friendship with Michael, a young man with cerebral palsy and nearly unintelligible speech. Somehow, Rory understands Michael, and encourages him to experience life outside the confines of home.
stars: James McAvoy, Steven Robertson, Romola Garai, Alan King

description: Mr. Lãzãrescu, a dying old man, is shuttled from hospital to hospital by a loyal paramedic as doctors refuse to operate and no one can agree on a diagnosis.
stars: Doru Ana, Monica Barladeanu, Alina Berzunteanu, Dorian Boguta

description: Martín and Mariana are slightly damaged people who live in buildings just opposite one another. While they often don't notice each other, separation might be the very thing that brings them together.
stars: Javier Drolas, Miguel Dedovich, Pilar López de Ayala, Miguel Alvarez

description: When his mother, who has sheltered him his entire 40 years, dies, sensitive would-be poet Elling is sent to live in a state institution. There he meets Kjell Bjarne, a gentle giant and ...                See full summary »
stars: Per Christian Ellefsen, Sven Nordin, Marit Pia Jacobsen, Jørgen Langhelle

description: When the estranged daughter of a hard-working live-in housekeeper suddenly appears, the unspoken class barriers that exist within the home are thrown into disarray.
stars: Regina Casé, Helena Albergaria, Michel Joelsas, Camila Márdila

description: This is the story of those who live as if every day was a constant Sunday, those who spend their Mondays in the sun. The story of people who worked in a dockyard but are now unemployed.
stars: Javier Bardem, Luis Tosar, José Ángel Egido, Nieve de Medina

description: A bizarre love triangle forms between a young Catholic upskirt photographer, a misandric girl and a manipulative cultist.
stars: Takahiro Nishijima, Hikari Mitsushima, Sakura Andô, Yutaka Shimizu

description: A band comprised of members of the Egyptian police force head to Israel to play at the inaugural ceremony of an Arab arts center, only to find themselves lost in the wrong town.
stars: Sasson Gabay, Ronit Elkabetz, Saleh Bakri, Khalifa Natour

description: Bill struggles to put together his shattered psyche, in this new feature film version of Don Hertzfeldt's animated short film trilogy.
stars: None

description: Three men from a provincial town are in urgent need of money and decide to buy a lottery ticket. They win the lottery, but soon after their ticket gets stolen.
stars: Dorian Boguta, Dragos Bucur, Alexandru Papadopol, Andi Vasluianu

description: A suicidal, obsessively compulsive Japanese librarian is forced to lie low in Thailand with a pot-smoking woman coping with the recent loss of her sister.
stars: Tadanobu Asano, Sinitta Boonyasak, Takashi Miike, Laila Boonyasak

description: A Brazilian photocopier operator falls in love with a girl who lives in an opposite house and spends his evenings looking at her through his binoculars.
stars: Lázaro Ramos, Leandra Leal, Luana Piovani, Pedro Cardoso
